body:
Well we all know that in a lot of matches on TDM a team gets 1-2 kills at the beginning and then hides all the match.
I think this should be prohibited for next tournaments, because this makes the gameplay a lot more boring.
What do you think?
body_tagged:

title: Hiding in TDM

replies.body:
If the map is good, there won't be any places to hide that won't give you a disadvantage.
Sentry was just bad.

replies.body: That type of matches is what I was talking about, i think TDM gameplay is very good and a lot more skill-based when no teams keep all the match hidden on a corner.

replies.body: TDM maps may start to avoid the spawn camping part. It depends if people continue to make maps that have more gameplay and less wasting time. However, I do think that there should be a rule to forbid spawn camping if it continues as it is a waste of time. Some people may call that a 'strat' but I think it is just runining the match and creating a boring tournament.
replies.body_tagged: TDM maps may start to avoid the spawn camping part. It depends if people continue to make maps that have more gameplay and less wasting time. However, I do think that there should be a rule to forbid spawn camping if it continues as it is a waste of time. Some people may call that a 'strat' but I think it is just runining the match and creating a boring tournament.

replies.body: If there's a map to combat spawn camping then that'd be great, but most of the maps don't have enough space and extra tunnels for someone to hide efficiently in them
replies.body_tagged: If there's a map to combat spawn camping then that'd be great, but most of the maps don't have enough space and extra tunnels for someone to hide efficiently in them

replies.body: Sentry is like the only map where camping doesn't give a huge disadvantage.
replies.body_tagged: Sentry is like the only map where camping doesn't give a huge disadvantage.
